data.event: Woman wasn't kidnapped, now is charged in robbery.

event.title: identified as a kidnapping victim is now

data.event: A Harlem woman initially identified as a kidnapping victim is now in jail, accused of participating in an armed robbery.
She was held without bond Monday in the Columbia County Detention Center, according to jail records.

event.title: is suspected in the armed robbery Friday

data.event: Police said her boyfriend Christopher Grier, of the 700 block of Knox Road in Harlem, is suspected in the armed robbery Friday of two individuals in their Grovetown home.

event.title: drove back to Harlem on Sunday

data.event: After they confirmed that she and the baby were safe, Ms. Odell drove back to Harlem on Sunday.
